alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western and central Marion County through 700 PM EDT... At 540 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking multiple thunderstorms with heavy rainfall across western and central Marion County, drifting west at 5 mph. These storms will be capable of quickly dumping 1-2 inches of rain over already saturated soil from last night`s rain, resulting in minor flooding in areas with poor drainage. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Rainbow Lakes Estates, Citra, Sparr, Anthony, Santos, Ocala Airport, Belleview, Dunnellon and Reddick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
